flavorText: It wants you to be its chum.

foreignData.flavorText: Er will dich nur freundlich umarmen.
foreignData.name: Springflut-Fleischreißers
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Ändere die Stärke des Springflut-Fleischreißers in die Stärke einer Kreatur deiner Wahl. (Sie ändert sich nicht am Ende des Zuges zurück.)

foreignData.name: Destrozador Resaca
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Cambia la fuerza del Destrozador Resaca por la fuerza de la criatura objetivo. (No recupera su fuerza original al final del turno.)

foreignData.name: Déchiqueteur du projet Jusant
foreignData.text: {1}{U} : Remplacez la force du Déchiqueteur du projet Jusant par la force de la créature ciblée. (Cet effet ne cesse pas à la fin du tour.)

foreignData.name: Divoratore della Marea
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: La forza del Divoratore della Marea diventa uguale alla forza di una creatura bersaglio (non torna al valore originale alla fine del turno).

foreignData.flavorText: Ele quer que você seja seu camarada.
foreignData.name: Calandreiro da Rebentação
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: O poder de Calandreiro da Rebentação torna-se igual ao poder da criatura alvo. (Ele não volta a ser o que era no final do turno.)

name: Riptide Mangler
originalText: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's power to target creature's power. (It doesn't change back at end of turn.)

rulings.text: The activated ability overwrites all previous effects that set Riptide Mangler’s base power to specific a value (such as previous activations of the ability). Other effects that set its base power that start to apply after Riptide Mangler’s ability resolves will overwrite this effect.

Effects that modify Riptide Mangler’s power, such as the effect of Giant Growth or Glorious Anthem, will apply to Riptide Mangler no matter when they started applying. The same is true for counters that affect Riptide Mangler’s power and effects that switch its power and toughness.

text: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's base power to target creature's power. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
